pages.about-us: About DecorLoom - Elevating Homes with Style DecorLoom HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Elevating Homes with Style At DecorLoom, we are passionate about transforming houses into homes with our exquisite range of home accessories. Our mission is to provide you with the perfect pieces that reflect your style and personality, turning every corner of your home into a reflection of your taste. From elegant decor accents to functional essentials, we curate our collection to inspire and elevate your living space. WHY CHOOSE DECORLOOM Unlock Your Home's Potential with DecorLoom Elevate your living space with DecorLoom's exclusive home accessories. Exquisite Designs Explore a curated selection of home accessories featuring exquisite designs that elevate your decor. Quality Craftsmanship Experience superior craftsmanship and attention to detail in every piece, ensuring lasting beauty and functionality. Exceptional Service Receive exceptional customer service and support from our dedicated team, ensuring a seamless shopping experience. CUSTOMER REVIEWS Discover What Our Customers are Saying About DecorLoom "DecorLoom has transformed my home with their stunning accessories. The quality of their products is exceptional, and their customer service is top-notch. I'm thrilled with my purchases and highly recommend DecorLoom to anyone looking to enhance their living space." pages.disclaimers: DecorLoom - Disclaimers and Policies DecorLoom HOME ABOUT US Products Contact DecorLoom Disclaimers Welcome to DecorLoom ("Service", "we", "us", or "our"). This disclaimer page informs you of our disclaimers regarding the information, products, services, and functionalities offered through our Service. Disclaimer for Information The information contained on the Service is for informational purposes only and should not be construed as professional advice. We make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the accuracy, completeness, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information or products and services contained on the Service for any purpose. You use the information at your own risk. We are not liable for any losses or damages arising from your use of the information on our Service. Disclaimer for Products and Services We offer a variety of products and services through our Service. While we use reasonable efforts to ensure the quality of these products and services, we make no guarantees or warranties, express or implied, about their performance or suitability for any purpose. You use these products and services at your own risk. Disclaimer for Errors and Omissions Despite our best efforts, there may be errors or omissions in the information and materials on our Service. We reserve the right to correct errors or omissions at any time without prior notice. Disclaimer for Third-Party Links Our Service may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by DecorLoom. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party websites or services. We strongly advise you to read the terms and conditions and privacy policies of any third-party websites or services that you visit. Disclaimer for Limitations of Liability In no event shall DecorLoom, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or licensors, be liable for any damages whatsoever, under any legal theory, arising out of or related to your use of the Service, or any other sites linked to or from the Service. pages.privacy-policy: DecorLoom - Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Data Privacy and Rights DecorLoom HOME ABOUT US Products Contact DecorLoom Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how DecorLoom ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website (the "Service") and the choices you have associated with that data. Information We Collect We collect several different types of information for various purposes to improve our Service to you. Personal Information While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Information"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to: Email address Name Billing address Shipping address Phone number Usage Data We may also collect information about how you access and use the Service ("Usage Data"). This Usage Data may include information such as your browser type, IP address, referring/exit pages, date and time of access, and other diagnostic data. Use of Your Information We use the collected data for various purposes: To provide and maintain the Service To improve the Service To personalize the Service To send you promotional emails and communications To respond to your inquiries and requests Disclosure of Your Information We may disclose your information to third parties for the following reasons: To our service providers who provide services such as website hosting, data storage, and marketing. To comply with a court order, legal obligation, or government request. Security The security of your information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Your Choices You have a choice regarding the collection and use of your information. You can choose not to use our Service. You can choose to unsubscribe from our communications. Updates to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. DecorLoom website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Agreement to Terms By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms and conditions, you may not access the Service.
